Class LCNBinding.RequestJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.binding.lcn.LCNBinding.RequestJob

    org.quartz.Job
    Enclosing class:
    LCNBinding<P extends LCNBindingProvider>

    public static class LCNBinding.RequestJob
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.quartz.Job
    A simple Job that will request data for modules, which do not support auto-updates.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek
